title: Khaby Lame
summary: Khabane "Khaby" Lame ([kabɪ la:mɛː]; born 9 March 2000) is a Senegalese-born Italian social media personality. He is known for his TikTok videos, in which he silently mocks overly complicated "life hack" videos. As of March  2023, Lame is the most-followed user on TikTok.
